title: Bug 49235: ServletContainerInitializer onStartup method does not output expected class
description: Bug 49235: ServletContainerInitializer onStartup method does not output expected class. The output is 'MySomeAnn' instead of 'MySomeClass'. This issue is not yet addressed in the Servlet 3.0 specification. My code works fine on Glassfish 3.0.
OB: The current output is 'MySomeAnn', but I expect the output to be 'MySomeClass'.
